title: Cinefantastique Vol 08 No 4 (Summer 1979)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story on Richard Donner's Superman. Also includes articles on Timegate, The Planet of Dinosaurs, The Black Hole, Starcrash, The Disappearance, Vortex, The Legacy, Moonraker, movie reviews, news and more.
